alert.note: Alert for Gila Bend (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 4:56PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 530 PM MST... At 456 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles east of Sentinel, or 19 miles west of Gila Bend. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gila Bend and Sentinel. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 81 and 112. AZ Route 85 between mile markers 7 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
